subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Junior Seau, a former linebacker, committed suicide in 2012 and had a subsequent diagnosis of traumatic brain injury. Pro football’s Hall of Fame said it had ended speeches for deceased inductees.
snippet: Junior Seau, a former linebacker, committed suicide in 2012 and had a subsequent diagnosis of traumatic brain injury. Pro football’s Hall of Fame said it had ended speeches for deceased inductees.
